channel.title: iDigital
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ‘I haven’t filed taxes in 20 years’: I’m 55 and about to get laid off. I’ve $1 million in crypto. Am I in big trouble?
item.description: “I have $800,000 split across two 401(k) plans and a $69,000 lump-sum pension.”

item.title: The new bill tweaking Social Security’s retirement-age language may be fixing the wrong problem
item.description: The Claiming Age Clarity Act would change the wording on different benchmark ages to claim benefits.

item.title: I’m 66. My mortgage is $250K and the rate is 3.4%. Would it be foolish to pay it off from my $770K investments?
item.description: “I don’t plan on taking Social Security until 70 and I will have one other small pension.”

item.title: People keep pushing bitcoin on me, but it crashes regularly. What am I missing?
item.description: How is owning crypto better portfolio management when U.S. stocks have come through every crisis?
